backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all core data types (users, packages, payments, referrals, landing pages, etc.) and business logic including Stripe configuration, access control, and blob storage for an affiliate marketing platform.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features with their associated files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels, primarily covering social media URL updates across Footer, InstagramSection, YouTubeSection, and other frontend components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing each component's purpose and notable changes such as real social media URLs, updated prices, scroll behavior, and UI modifications.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file setting up Tailwind directives and defining CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, Open Graph, and Twitter card metadata optimized for the Evergreen Hub affiliate marketing platform.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application file that configures TanStack Router with all routes for the landing page, auth pages, user dashboard, and admin dashboard, wrapped in Auth, Theme, and QueryClient providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageModal: A simple admin dialog modal that displays a full-size payment screenshot image passed via props.
frontend/src/components/admin/PackageMod: An admin dialog form for creating or editing course packages (name, price, courses), using React Query mutations to call the backend actor and invalidate the packages cache on success.
frontend/src/components/AppearanceSettin: Modal dialog component that allows users to switch between light, dark, and system default themes using a radio group with icons and saves the selection via the ThemeContext.
frontend/src/components/BottomCTASection: A bottom call-to-action section with a gradient background that displays a 'Start Learning Today' heading and a button that smoothly scrolls to the courses section.
Displays a table of commission data for six membership packages, showing active and passive income amounts alongside package prices.
frontend/src/components/CongratulationsM: A modal dialog shown after successful payment submission, displaying a congratulatory message with a random motivational quote and a WhatsApp share button.
frontend/src/components/ContactFormSecti: A landing page section that wraps the ContactInterestForm component with a scroll animation, header text, and a styled card container.
frontend/src/components/ContactInterestF: A contact form that collects name, phone, email, and message, then opens a pre-filled WhatsApp message to a business number upon submission, with validation and an auto-reset success state.
A sticky top banner displaying a live countdown timer that resets every 24 hours, used to create urgency for a limited-time offer.
frontend/src/components/CoursePackagesMo: A modal that fetches and displays active course packages in a grid of cards, allowing users to select a package which then opens a PaymentModal.
frontend/src/components/EvergreenAIChatb: An empty file with no content or exports.
Renders a styled Facebook follow/visit section with scroll animation, linking to the Evergreen Hub Facebook page with 'Like Page' and 'Visit Page' buttons.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Renders a FAQ section using an accordion component with five predefined questions and answers about affiliate marketing, with a scroll-triggered fade-in animation.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: Displays a fixed floating WhatsApp contact button in the bottom-right corner that opens a pre-filled WhatsApp chat with a masked phone number.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand info, social media links (Facebook, Instagram, YouTube), quick navigation links, and a legal links section including privacy policy.
frontend/src/components/FounderSection.t: Displays a founder profile section for Rudra Pratap Singh with a photo, skill badges, and scroll animations against a dark emerald gradient background.
frontend/src/components/GradientBlobs.ts: Renders three fixed, full-screen decorative gradient blob elements as a non-interactive background layer.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive site header with logo, desktop navigation, auth-aware login/register or account dropdown, and a mobile sidebar toggle that becomes opaque on scroll.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with animated headline, subheadline in Hindi/English, and CTA buttons to explore courses or open a WhatsApp chat.
frontend/src/components/InstagramSection: Renders a styled Instagram follow section with scroll animation, linking to the @evergreenhub2026 profile with 'Follow Us' and 'View Profile' buttons.
frontend/src/components/MobileSidebar.ts: A mobile navigation sidebar component rendered as a slide-out sheet, showing nav links, package accordion, user profile info, and auth-aware actions like dashboard and logout.
frontend/src/components/MyReferralLink.t: Displays the authenticated user's referral link (based on their Internet Identity principal) with a copy-to-clipboard button and sharing tip.
frontend/src/components/PaymentGateway.t: A static display card showing a PhonePe QR code image and masked bank account details (India Post Payment Bank) along with payment instructions.
frontend/src/components/PaymentModal.tsx: A dialog modal that combines PaymentGateway and PaymentProofForm to let users complete a package purchase by submitting a transaction ID and screenshot, then shows a CongratulationsModal on success.
frontend/src/components/PaymentProofForm: A form component for submitting payment proof, accepting a transaction ID and screenshot file (up to 5MB), uploading it as an ExternalBlob with progress tracking, and showing success or error states.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Renders all six course packages as cards with expandable course lists, inline payment flow (PaymentGateway + PaymentProofForm), and a CongratulationsModal, using React Query to submit payment proofs to the backend actor.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: A route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to login and non-admin users away from admin routes, showing a loading spinner during auth initialization.
frontend/src/components/ReferralsSection: Displays a user's referral list and commission summary (active, passive, pending) fetched via React Query hooks, with status badges and package name mapping.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTopButto: A fixed button that appears after scrolling 300px and smoothly scrolls the page back to the top when clicked.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Renders a scroll-animated section displaying three hardcoded student testimonials with star ratings, names, and locations.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggleSwitc: A button component that toggles between light and dark themes using the ThemeContext, with animated Sun/Moon icon transitions.
frontend/src/components/TrustBadgesSecti: Displays a scroll-animated row of trust badge cards highlighting Expert Instructors, 24/7 Support, and Money-Back Guarantee.
frontend/src/components/VideoEditingSect: A marketing section for a ₹1,500 video editing service featuring a feature grid, a payment modal trigger, and a WhatsApp contact button.
frontend/src/components/WebDesignPayment: A dialog modal for completing web design package payments, allowing users to enter a transaction ID, attach a screenshot, and send payment proof via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/WebDesignService: Promotional section component for web design services, displaying a Basic Package highlight card with pricing (₹2,999), features, and other package tiers, with a payment modal trigger and scroll animation.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeSplashScr: A one-time-per-session animated splash screen shown on first visit, featuring a logo, floating particles, glowing rings, and a dismiss button, using sessionStorage to track if it has been seen.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsSecti: A section component displaying four benefit cards (Expert-Led Courses, Community Support, Beginner Friendly, Lifetime Access) with icons and descriptions, animated on scroll.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeSection.t: A section component that embeds an Evergreen Hub YouTube playlist and provides a subscribe button link, with scroll-triggered fade-in animation.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: React context providing authentication state (identity, user profile, admin status) with login/logout methods backed by Internet Identity, and a refreshProfile function that fetches profile and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/contexts/ThemeContext.tsx: React context managing light/dark/system theme preference, persisting the selection to localStorage and applying the resolved theme class to the document root and body.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing login/logout state via DFINITY's AuthClient and exposing identity, status flags, and login/clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data (packages, payment proofs, user profiles, earnings, withdrawals, landing pages, etc.) using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Custom hook that uses IntersectionObserver to track whether a referenced element is visible in the viewport, supporting configurable threshold, root margin, and single-trigger behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, and provides utility classes for layout, shadows, and smooth theme transitions.
frontend/src/layouts/AdminDashboardLayou: Admin dashboard layout component with a responsive sidebar (desktop and mobile via Sheet) containing navigation links, user info, and logout, wrapped in a ProtectedRoute requiring admin access.
frontend/src/layouts/UserDashboardLayout: User dashboard layout component with a dark-themed responsive sidebar showing navigation links, user profile photo, and logout button, wrapped in a ProtectedRoute for authenticated users.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: Renders the About Us page for Evergreen Hub with animated sections covering the company's identity, mission, offerings, values, and team using scroll-triggered animations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminStats.tsx: Admin dashboard statistics page that fetches and displays total users, sales, revenue, and pending payments using React Query with a 30-second auto-refresh interval.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PackageManageme: Admin page for managing course packages, supporting add, edit, delete, and toggle-status operations via React Query mutations with a table UI and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PaymentManageme: Admin page for viewing and managing payment proofs, allowing filtering by status and approving or rejecting individual payment submissions with screenshot viewing support.
Admin page for listing all registered users with search, block/unblock toggle, and delete functionality using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/WithdrawalManag: Admin page for viewing and managing user withdrawal requests, supporting status filtering and approve/reject actions via mutations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Provides an admin-only login page using Internet Identity authentication, redirecting verified admins to the admin dashboard and denying access to non-admin users.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Renders the Contact page with WhatsApp and phone contact options, a contact interest form, and links to social/support channels.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPagePreview.ts: Fetches and displays a landing page by ID from the backend, increments its visit count on load, and renders its HTML content with a 404 fallback.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Renders the user login page using Internet Identity authentication, redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard and showing relevant alerts and a remember-me option.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Displays the Privacy Policy page with scroll-animated sections covering data collection, usage, and user rights, along with SEO meta tag updates.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicy.tsx: Displays Evergreen Hub's refund policy page with a strict no-refund notice, scroll animations, and SEO meta tag updates. Covers digital product terms, limited exceptions, and contact information.
frontend/src/pages/Register.tsx: User registration page that authenticates via Internet Identity, validates form fields, and calls the backend `registerUser` method with optional referral principal support.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfService.tsx: Renders Evergreen Hub's Terms of Service page with animated sections covering acceptance, eligibility, course access, and legal disclaimers, plus SEO meta tag setup.
frontend/src/pages/user/ChangePassword.t: User page with a form to change account password, including validation for length, match, and difference from current password.
frontend/src/pages/user/DashboardOvervie: User dashboard overview page displaying earnings, payment proofs, packages, referral link, and a commission chart with an animated rising-bubbles background effect.
frontend/src/pages/user/LandingPageBuild: A page component for creating, editing, and deleting landing pages, with a form supporting title, content, and template fields and CRUD mutations via custom hooks.
frontend/src/pages/user/MyLandingPages.t: A page that lists all landing pages for the authenticated user in a table, with options to preview, edit (navigating to the builder), and delete each page.
frontend/src/pages/user/MyPackages.tsx: Displays the user's purchased packages by fetching their payment proofs and matching them to package details, showing status badges and transaction info.
A settings page allowing users to update their name, phone number, and profile photo, with image preview and upload functionality via the actor and custom hooks.
frontend/src/pages/user/WithdrawalReques: A page for submitting and viewing withdrawal requests, which on success opens a pre-filled WhatsApp message to notify the admin and lists past requests with status badges.
frontend/src/pages/WebDesignServices.tsx: Web design services landing page listing five pricing packages, customer testimonials, and FAQs, with a payment modal trigger and WhatsApp contact integration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors using OKLCH variables, border radii, box shadows, fonts, accordion animations, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file recording existing features and new requests, primarily focused on updating social media links (YouTube, Facebook, Instagram) across frontend components to use real URLs with target='_blank'.
